about_the_game:
Just one normal delivery... is that too much to ask?

Working postal sure takes its toll on you, even if you have magic by your side. Moving from house to house, keeping track of the goods, making sure not to damage them, final delivery, and... Sorry? I have to climb a what?

Spellbrew Express is a movement-based platformer all about climbing your way to a legendary goblin pub perched atop a treacherous mountain. Explore ancient ruins and icy peaks as you learn more about this captivating destination.

~ Perform with flair~

The art of postal delivery requires pushing your magic arsenal to its limits. Sometimes, you might even need to use nearby fauna and objects to your aid!

~ Meet the residents ~

Befriend (or annoy) the resident goblins. Beware, they have an attitude.

~ Skill check required ~

Challenge yourself with difficult, optional collectibles along the trail. You sure don't mind lining your (almost empty) pockets!

~ The world awaits ~

Explore lush forests, ruined undergrounds, and snowy summits — each an entirely new challenge for the unaccustomed. For you? It's Tuesday.

~ Unveil the hidden ~

Discover the remnants of a different era and the goblin civilization sprouting from its ashes. And if you look closely enough, someone's been hiding some riches! 

~ Beer! ~

Waiting for you by the summit! What are you waiting for?

But hey, enough reading.

You're on the clock — get moving!

short_description: Low wages, high adventure – every delivery is a magical struggle. Bounce, blast, and cast through treacherous ruins and vibrant forests in this movement-based 2D platformer. That goblin brew atop the mountain won't deliver itself. Time is money— get moving!
